applicationHostUrl.description: The location of the SAPOData resource.

applicationServicePath.description: The application path to catalog service.

clientNumber.description: The client number for the client creating the connection.

logonLanguage.description: The logon language of SAPOData instance.

oauthProperties.description: The SAPOData OAuth properties required for OAuth type authentication.

portNumber.description: The port number of the SAPOData instance.

privateLinkServiceName.description: The SAPOData Private Link service name to be used for private data transfers.
